code: import React from'react';import{useWeb3React}from'@web3-react/core';import{AutoRenewIcon,HistoryIcon,IconButton}from'@pancakeswap/uikit';import{useAppDispatch}from'state';import{setHistoryPaneState}from'state/predictions';import{useGetIsFetchingHistory}from'state/hooks';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const HistoryButton=()=>{const isFetchingHistory=useGetIsFetchingHistory();const dispatch=useAppDispatch();const{account}=useWeb3React();const handleClick=()=>{dispatch(setHistoryPaneState(true));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IconButton,{variant:"subtle",ml:"8px",onClick:handleClick,isLoading:isFetchingHistory,disabled:!account,children:isFetchingHistory?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AutoRenewIcon,{spin:true,color:"white"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HistoryIcon,{width:"24px",color:"white"})});};export default HistoryButton;
